channel.title: How Do you make a 508 Webclient? Also a question about Webs.com
channel.description: Okay so I have a 508 server that i am developing and it is done but before i release it i want to make a wbclient. My question is how do you make one. and also how do you upload a jar to webs.com websites

item.title: How Do you make a 508 Webclient? Also a question about Webs.com
item.dc:creator: @RS_Gamer001 RS Gamer001
item.description:
@RS_Gamer001 wrote:

PureEpics:

It’s possible but here’s something you should know. Last person that made a client with Jagex’s newer graphics(503s and 508s)got sued and shut down by Jagex.

I seem to know of one that was online for a long time, and still works now!

Read full topic
item.source: How Do you make a 508 Webclient? Also a question about Webs.com

item.title: How Do you make a 508 Webclient? Also a question about Webs.com
item.dc:creator: @rain1994 rain1994
item.description:
@rain1994 wrote:

[quote=“RuneRageRsps, post:5, topic:317188”][quote author=PureEpics link=topic=413731.msg3047050#msg3047050 date=1259807954]
It’s possible but here’s something you should know. Last person that made a client with Jagex’s newer graphics(503s and 508s)got sued and shut down by Jagex.
[/quote]
The way to avoid that is by making an agreement on your homepage before anyone can even see the webclient that the viewer is not a member of jagex, or a friend/family member of one.[/quote]

does anyone know if this will compleatly block jagex? It would be nice to make a webclient for my 562

Read full topic
item.source: How Do you make a 508 Webclient? Also a question about Webs.com

item.title: How Do you make a 508 Webclient? Also a question about Webs.com
item.dc:creator: @RuneRageRsps RuneRageRsps
item.description:
@RuneRageRsps wrote:

PureEpics:

It’s possible but here’s something you should know. Last person that made a client with Jagex’s newer graphics(503s and 508s)got sued and shut down by Jagex.

The way to avoid that is by making an agreement on your homepage before anyone can even see the webclient that the viewer is not a member of jagex, or a friend/family member of one.

Read full topic
item.source: How Do you make a 508 Webclient? Also a question about Webs.com

item.title: How Do you make a 508 Webclient? Also a question about Webs.com
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Dell:

same way as you make a 317 webclient , just make it into a .dat and compress that into a .jar , and compress the cache .

I can tell you know that you are wrong.

Read full topic
